Name: ModulAR
Description:
Build your own AR how you want it!

You will find all the parts in 
Pistol > Lever Action

This mod features a pack with :

Two AR Receivers in 5.56mm and 9mm
Multiple barrel lengths for both 5.56mm and 9mm
Railed and front post sight gas ports for those barrels
Three hand guards
A fixed and collapsible stock
Two styles of pistol grips usable as picatinny attachments
ShortDescription: Build your own AR how you want it!
